required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Validation of the Moral Injury Symptom Scale Clinician Version Short Form in AdventHealth Clinicians

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this research is to validate the moral injury symptom scale clinician version short form with AdventHealth Orlando clinicians. Participants will be recruited in accordance with AdventHealth Policy # 400.120: Selection and Enrollment of AdventHealth Employees, Physicians, and Volunteers for research Studies. Employee participants will be assured participation in this study will not affect performance evaluation or employment-related decisions by peers or supervisors. No employees will be recruited by a direct supervisor. Recruitment of potential employees as participants will occur without coercion by the Principal Investigator (PI), by bulletin board advertisements, or through a third party unassociated in a power/supervisory relationship with the employee (i.e., researchers from Center for Whole-Person Research).

primary_outcome.description: Measured by Moral Injury Symptom Scale - Clinician Version - Short Form (MISS-CV-SF) 11 items. The scale is 10 - 100 with the higher number being worse

secondary_outcome.description: measured by Expressions of Moral Injury Scale (EMIS) 17 items The scale is 17 - 85 with the higher number being worse
measured by Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ) 10 items. Scale is 0-31, with the higher number being worse
measured by generalized Anxiety Disorder (GAD) 8 items. The scale is 0-25 with the higher number being worse
measured by the Belief into Action (BIAC) scale 10 items. The scale is 9-90 with the higher number being more religious
measured by Maslach Burnout Inventory (MBI) 22 items. The scale is 0-54 for emotional exhaustion with the higher number being worse
measured by 2-item questionnaire (quality of relationship and involvement in community activities). The scale is 2-20 with the higher number being the more importance of religion and spirituality.

arm_group.description: Physicians, Nurses, or Respiratory Therapists will be taking the Clinician Questionnaire electronically.

intervention.description: Physicians, Nurses and Respiratory Therapists will take the Clinician Questionnaire electronically

study_pop.textblock: Employees of AdventHealth who are a physician, nurse or respiratory therapist

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Currently working at AdventHealth Orlando as a physician, nurse, or respiratory therapist
2. Practiced as physician, nurse, or respiratory therapist for no less than 1 year
3. Access to AdventHealth e-mail via computer or mobile device
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Any employee at AdventHealth Orlando who is not a physician, nurse, or respiratory therapist
